title: No option to finalize my summoner name
body:
Finally creating a smurf acc, except when I try to choose a name there's no option for me to actually proceed.

I have tried typing in random letters to see if the name was just taken but the same thing happened.

https://gyazo.com/39326e5351a6bfd58822666f151963f7

replies.body: Did you try pressing the Enter key?

Oh that's weird, where did the button go!  You should grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a force repatch in case your game files may have gone bad.   I'd try and help manually for you, but it would be a risk to request your username through a public venue.  That repair should help, though!
